timeline.bodyText: Leaving aside the argument of what getApiValueFromContainer should be returning for the moment, if we go ahead with this way, this should be an ImmutableValue. If you have an ImmutableValue, it'll will be converted to a Value then back to an ImmutableValue again for no particular reason. Minimise conversions please.
timeline.author: dualspiral

replies.bodyText: I hope I understand you correctly. I made some changes in the next commit.
replies.author: Lignium
